name: d3-country-bubble-chart-master
description: This project demonstrates various ways in which [D3](https://d3js.org/)'s [forces simulation](https://github.com/d3/d3-force) can lay out elements. Each element is a circle that represents a country. The area of each circle is proportional to the [UN's 2015 population estimate](https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Download/Standard/Population/) of the country. Each circle is filled with a color or the flag of the country.
